mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${SCHEMA_TASK}.TASK_FOLLOW (TASK_ID, FOLLOWER, FOLLOW_TIME) SELECT #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{follower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW() FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM ${SCHEMA_TASK}.TASK_FOLLOW WHERE TASK_ID=#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FOLLOWER=#{follower,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
